result.execSummary:
The defendant Rodney E. Kersten was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant appeared with Attorney James McLaughlin.  State appears by Attorney Poquette.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  DE entered plea of no contest.  Court finds DE guilty.

Court:  Costs $673.50 - given 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.

Defendant Rodney E. Kersten in court with attorney Jesse Johansen via phone.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Johansen states another PD was to be appointed.  Court advised Atty to notify PD's Office.  (clerk e-mailed PD to advise them new atty needs to be appointed to all cases)  Status conference scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 10:00 am.   10:29 AM  Back on the record - Atty McL states he will represent the defendant on all cases.

Defendant Rodney E. Kersten in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Johansen notifies court he has a conflict of interest in a different case (15CM166 with Judge John Anderson) with this DEF, but does not need to remove himself from this case.  Reset.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 26, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Defendant Rodney E. Kersten in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Rodney E. Kersten in court with attorney Jesse Johansen via phone.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury trial will be taken off.  Bail continues
  Status conference scheduled for January 26, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Rodney E. Kersten in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury trial scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 15, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Rodney E. Kersten in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 15 CM 166.  10:28 AM  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Atty Hoffman makes stmt requests another status conference.  Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Rodney E. Kersten in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.  NG plea by Court.  SIBS $500.00 No special conditions.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 10:00 am.
